channel.title: CNN brk
channel.description: 这是一个追踪CNN brknews的种子

item.title: 联邦法官裁定，乔-拜登总统的儿子亨特-拜登将于 6 月 3 日因涉枪指控受审。
item.description:
Hunter Biden, the son of President Joe Biden, will go on trial for gun-related charges on June 3, a federal judge has ruled https://t.co/15LRA2E17Z

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在 2021 年密歇根州校园枪击案中，一名青少年杀害了四名学生，他的父亲詹姆斯-克拉布里（James Crumbley）被判过失杀人罪，陪审团已开始审议此案。
item.description:
A jury has begun deliberations in the manslaughter trial of James Crumbley, the father of a teen who killed four students in a 2021 Michigan school shooting https://t.co/vcGiq75ud9

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 13, 2024

item.title: 佐治亚州颠覆选举案法官驳回对特朗普及其同案被告的部分指控，但保留大部分起诉内容
item.description:
Judge in the Georgia election subversion case dismisses some charges against Trump and his co-defendants but leaves most of the indictment intact https://t.co/zwmL5Am0fQ

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 13, 2024

item.title: 众议院通过了一项可能导致在全国范围内禁止使用 TikTok 的法案，但该法案在参议院的前景并不明朗
item.description:
House passes a bill that could lead to a nationwide ban of TikTok, though the measure faces an uncertain future in the Senate https://t.co/CgMOiz7fWB

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 13, 2024

item.title: 由于通货膨胀侵蚀了消费者的钱包和折扣零售商的利润，Family Dollar 和 Dollar Tree 将关闭约 1,000 家门店
item.description:
Family Dollar and Dollar Tree will close about 1,000 stores as inflation takes a bite out of consumers' wallets and discount retailers' profitshttps://t.co/G9njkLxOVm

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）预测，特朗普获得足够的共和党总统候选人提名，将在 11 月与拜登展开复赛
item.description:
Trump secures enough delegates for the Republican nomination for president, CNN projects, setting up a rematch with Biden in November https://t.co/Usmd1OI7T4 pic.twitter.com/Xe380mJ4e3

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 13, 2024

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空公司称，该航班原计划在飞机部分部件爆炸当天停飞检修
item.description:
Alaska Airlines flight was scheduled to be taken out of service for maintenance the same day part of the plane blew off, the company says https://t.co/s0kETPok8d

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 13, 2024

item.title: 美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）预测，拜登正式获得民主党总统候选人提名，从而可将重点转向赢得连任
item.description:
Biden officially clinches the Democratic nomination for president, CNN projects, allowing him to pivot focus on winning a second term https://t.co/sBYAsiieuD pic.twitter.com/iFW6PAQ3sz

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 12, 2024

item.title: 拜登和特朗普有望赢得获得党内提名所需的代表票数，投票已开始接近尾声。请收看并关注实时更新。
item.description:
Polls are starting to close as Biden and Trump expect to win delegates needed to clinch their parties' nominations. Watch and follow live updates.https://t.co/Xeqd56nJ9V

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 12, 2024

item.title: 乌瓦尔德警察局长在一份报告宣布警官在 2022 年罗布小学大屠杀中无过错几天后突然宣布辞职
item.description:
Uvalde police chief abruptly announces resignation days after a report cleared officers of wrongdoing during the 2022 Robb Elementary School massacre https://t.co/BrQcinILCy

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 12, 2024

item.title: 科罗拉多州众议员肯-巴克（Ken Buck）不再寻求连任，现在他表示将在任期结束前离职，这对共和党本已岌岌可危的众议院多数席位是一个打击。
item.description:
Colorado Rep. Ken Buck, who won't seek reelection, now says he'll leave before the end of his term in a blow to the GOP's already slim House majority https://t.co/bUmxVVpS8p

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 12, 2024

item.title: 美国宣布向乌克兰提供价值高达 3 亿美元的新一揽子军事援助，此前数月曾警告已无剩余资金
item.description:
US announces a new military aid package for Ukraine worth up to $300 million after months of warning there was no money left https://t.co/rWWF9kswTc

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 12, 2024

item.title: 特别顾问就拜登对机密文件的不当处理作证，此前发布的报告强调总统记忆力衰退。
item.description:
Special counsel testifies on Biden's mishandling of classified documents after issuing report that highlighted the president's memory lapses.

Follow live updates. https://t.co/limZbEcvW4

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 12, 2024

item.title: 以色列国防军称，一名美以双重国籍公民在 10 月 7 日的哈马斯袭击中丧生，他是被认为仍被活捉在加沙的六名公民之一。
item.description:
A dual US-Israeli citizen, one of six still thought to have been held alive in Gaza, was killed in the October 7 Hamas attacks, IDF says https://t.co/RGF2PidSdI

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 12, 2024

item.title: 采访记录显示，拜登在机密文件调查中告诉调查人员，他不知道他的助手是如何存储敏感文件的
item.description:
Biden told investigators in classified documents probe he didn't know how his aides stored sensitive papers, a transcript of the interview showshttps://t.co/TRuhecna8C

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 12, 2024

item.title: 据当地警方称，备受争议的影响力人物安德鲁-泰特（Andrew Tate）及其兄弟特里斯坦（Tristan）因英国性犯罪指控在罗马尼亚被拘留。
item.description:
Controversial influencer Andrew Tate and his brother Tristan have been detained in Romania over UK sex offense charges, according to local policehttps://t.co/nYf3fTT8PY

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 12, 2024

item.title: 据一个非政府组织称，一艘向加沙运送人道主义援助物资的船只已驶离塞浦路斯，这是首次向加沙运送海上援助物资
item.description:
A ship carrying humanitarian aid to Gaza has departed Cyprus, according to an NGO, which said it is the first maritime aid shipment to Gaza https://t.co/T4x82pEBPM

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 12, 2024

item.title: 据歌手埃里克-卡门的网站报道，以歌曲《All By Myself》和《Hungry Eyes》闻名的歌手埃里克-卡门已经去世。享年 74 岁。
item.description:
Singer Eric Carmen, known for songs "All By Myself" and "Hungry Eyes," has died, according to his website. He was 74. https://t.co/DuBaGjfmH8

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 12, 2024

item.title: 独家报道：一名前马阿拉歌员工讲述自己如何在不知情的情况下帮助将机密文件搬上前总统唐纳德-特朗普 2022 年的专机
item.description:
Exclusive: A former Mar-a-Lago employee describes how he unknowingly helped move classified documents onto former President Donald Trump's plane in 2022 https://t.co/kCJv4TuAtO

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 11, 2024

item.title: 住房和城市发展部部长玛西娅-福吉（Marcia Fudge）将于本月晚些时候离开拜登政府
item.description:
Housing and Urban Development Secretary Marcia Fudge will leave the Biden administration later this month https://t.co/L5wupY5GlZ

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 11, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统发布年度预算，旨在以 7.266 万亿美元的资金提案吸引对经济不乐观的选民，这些提案主要是愿望性的
item.description:
President Biden releases an annual budget aimed at appealing to voters who are sour on the economy with $7.266 trillion in funding proposals that are primarily aspirational https://t.co/toRqlQZL7v

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 11, 2024

item.title: 威尔士王妃凯瑟琳为 "混乱 "道歉，称她编辑的英国母亲节全家福照片被通讯社撤回
item.description:
Catherine, Princess of Wales, apologizes for "confusion" and says she edited a UK Mother's Day family photo that was retracted by news agencies https://t.co/ikenpGHHV1

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 11, 2024

item.title: "奥本海默》一举夺得奥斯卡最佳影片。克里斯托弗-诺兰（Christopher Nolan）和西里安-墨菲（Cillian Murphy）也获得了奖项。以下是全部获奖名单。
item.description:
"Oppenheimer" dominates the Oscars, winning best picture. Christopher Nolan and Cillian Murphy also take home awards. Here's the full list of winners. https://t.co/JWDhpUkFWs

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 11, 2024

item.title: 小罗伯特-唐尼凭借《奥本海默》首次获得奥斯卡最佳男配角奖，该片被誉为他的最佳表演之一
item.description:
Robert Downey Jr. wins his first Oscar for best supporting actor in "Oppenheimer," which has been hailed as one of his best performances https://t.co/N2MlNYE83x

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 11, 2024

item.title: 新闻机构召回威尔士王妃凯瑟琳的照片，称他们认为照片被篡改了
item.description:
News agencies recall image of Catherine, Princess of Wales, saying they believe the photo has been manipulated https://t.co/ToIojNAbXy

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 11, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统签署了重要的政府拨款法案，使之成为法律，此前，立法者争分夺秒地避免了政府部分停摆，但另一个最后期限即将到来。
item.description:
President Biden signs key government funding bills into law after lawmakers raced to avert a partial government shutdown – but another deadline is approaching. https://t.co/4GyxWqbnZf

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 9, 2024

item.title: 在一次令人尴尬的失败中，爱尔兰政府承认在修改宪法中所谓 "性别歧视 "语言的投票中败北
item.description:
In an embarrassing defeat, the Irish government conceded that it had lost votes to change what it called "sexist" language in the constitution https://t.co/yUeGYUTefe

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 9, 2024

item.title: 参议院通过避免政府部分停摆的临时法案，拜登将签署该法案。
item.description:
Senate passes stopgap bill to avert a partial government shutdown, clearing it for Biden's signature. https://t.co/L31BB15x8h

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 9, 2024

item.title: 微软公司在对 1 月份首次披露的入侵事件进行更新时表示，俄罗斯国家支持的黑客已进入微软的核心软件系统
item.description:
Russian state-backed hackers gained access to Microsoft's core software systems, company says in update to intrusion first disclosed in January https://t.co/3MAYnjhafT

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 8, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普就 E. Jean Carroll 诽谤案判决提出上诉，并交纳 9163 万美元保证金
item.description:
Donald Trump posts $91.63 million bond as he files notice to appeal the judgment against him in E. Jean Carroll defamation case https://t.co/LhSWI7vImX

— CNN Breaking News (@cnnbrk) March 8, 2024
